pyELIJAH.detection.transit package

Submodules

pyELIJAH.detection.transit.transit module

pyELIJAH.detection.transit.transit.load_limb_coeff(limb_dark_path)[source]

This function return the coefficients for the parametrization of the limb darkening

Parameters:

limb_dark_path – string containing the path to the limb darkening csv file produced by https://exoctk.stsci.edu/limb_darkening

Returns:

an array containing the mean of the two coefficients and related errors of the quadratic limb darkening parametrization

pyELIJAH.detection.transit.transit_yaml module

pyELIJAH.detection.transit.transit_yaml.load_limb_coeff(limb_dark_path, profile)[source]

This function return the coefficients for the parametrization of the limb darkening

Parameters:

  • limb_dark_path – string containing the path to the limb darkening csv file produced by https://exoctk.stsci.edu/limb_darkening

  • profile – string containing the name of the profile. Possible values: [“quadratic”, “exponential”, “linear”, logarithmic”, “square-root”]

Returns:

an array containing the mean of at maximum 4 limb darkening coefficients

pyELIJAH.detection.transit.transit_yaml.transit_yaml(yaml_params, output_folder_path, input_folder_path)[source]

This function calculates the light curve of the transit

Parameters:

  • yaml_params – object of Parameters class containing the keys and values of the stored in the yaml file

  • output_folder_path – string containing the path to the output folder, where to save results

  • input_folder_path – string containing the path to the input folder, where to retrieve the files needed for the algorithm

Returns:

an array containing the mean of at maximum 4 limb darkening coefficients

Module contents

Transit detection module. Here are presents two modules:

  • transit.py, that produce the transit light curve using the batman-package and the quadratic limb-darkening parametrization.

  • transit_yaml.py, a more complete version of transit.py that still calculates the light curve, but in a more personalized way
